title: Apparently New Zealanders (such as me) are getting a ton of lag??
body:
Cuz I definitely had a ton...during a ranked game...

I'm so proud of my team, they 4v5'd excellently xDD

But no seriously, apparently many other New Zealanders are getting heavy lag which occasionally spike up to 2700 Ping or so...
Is it a problem on my side? Or are others experiencing the same?

{{champion:39}}

replies.body: There is a bug with SSD (solid state drives) that if left idle for too long  (it might be something to do with pc sleep mode)  you will getting like mini lag.

Sorry to hear that MageBlades, I haven't seen anything widespread but would like to better understand your problem when playing. Can you go to this link and follow the steps listed: http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/tools/network-logs

This will help us take a look into your routing and potentially find a reason behind your connectivity problems.

I'v been having spikes of lag up high around that lately, been good for a few days though. I'm on fibre, dunno if that makes a difference with the international lines going to Aussie though. Are you on copper or Fibre?

(Probably should make a new thread for this)
The new international net line in NZ (Subject to our Govt approval) will hopefully will go through Hawaii to USA soon, once our Govt gets enough grief from the public (Promulgate this round and make other kiwis aware of whats required for faster net) and who knows our ping could be better from NA over OCE lol. Na just kidding it will never be, but downloading and streaming would be  a lot better. As currently we have to go though Aussie lines to get hooked up to the rest of the world (sigh).
